column4: hello, I installed ubuntu 6.10. I have a USB network interface (linksys). I installed ndiswrapper and andiswrapper utils
the problem is that ifconfig doesn't show the interface, iwconfig shows eth2 as wireless interface, but i cannot configure it
ifconfig shows only active interfaces, ifconfig -a will show all of them
ah alright, but that doesn't resolve the main problem
I personnally always configure my network from CLI
I try for example sudo iwconfig eth2 essid "myessid"
ndiswrapper said: hardware present, driver present
then try configuroing the WEP key and the ESSID at the same time   sudo iwconfig eth2 essid YOUR_ESSID key YOUR_KEY
iketurner : i typed sudo iwconfig eth2 essid myessid key xxxx-xxxx-xx
